LanguageData.ManaPotionHigh.stages.0.label: mana surge
LanguageData.ManaPotionHigh.stages.0.description: This power... it's overwhelming. I feel the power of the cosmos at my fingertips, but it's turning my bones to ash.
LanguageData.ManaPotionWithdrawal.stages.1.label: mana withdrawal
LanguageData.ManaPotionWithdrawal.stages.1.descriptio: Ugh... everything is a blur. I can't seem to focus or control my body, I feel separated from reality. I need to feel mana flowing into my soul.
